name: Override (Camilo Quintero)
description:
Game made for the GMTK Jam in 48h.

Override is an action-adventure puzzle game where you play as an energy being that was a result of an experiment. Now you must find your way to the 4 scientists that created you and free them, with the help of a robot you possess.

(The game has no sound because we ran out of time :( )

Created by;

  • Camilo Quintero
  • Sergio Sandoval

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows to move
  • Space to enter/exit things
  • Left Shift to interact
  • ESC to pause
